name: GeraScopia
description:
GeraScopia is a Singleplayer Horror Platformer about escaping the depths you've been thrown into. Climb your way out using what little tools you can find throughout your journey, and hope that you are one of the few who were lucky enough to escape. Use your environment to hide and run from whatever lurks below.

The abyss is confusing, but you have all the time in the world.

  • Dynamic Difficulty which streamlines the player experience
  • "Explorer Mode", for those who want the full experience of GeraScopia in a safer environment
  • Simple and Lenient Platforming which allows you to climb on walls and Explore your surroundings
  • A Plethora of Secrets and Interactions which makes each individual experience of GeraScopia unique
  • Fishing.
  • Multiple Endings, each with their own unique requirements
